title: Maritime Safety Training: Game-Based Simulation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Maritime Terminology and Awareness of Ship Safety Equipment
context.additional_context: Mid-level professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields with maritime safety knowledge, participating in 5-day real-time online sessions (3 hours/day) and game simulations via personal tablets/laptops.

learning_goals: Perform appropriate safety procedures (selecting escape routes, wearing life jackets, etc.) with 90% accuracy in emergency situations
Successfully apply teamwork-based problem-solving strategies in shipboard fire/flooding scenarios with over 80% success rate
Fully master the usage methods of safety equipment required by the International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea (SOLAS)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
